body_review:
(Translated by Google) Very nice hotel

(Original)
Hotel yang sangat bagus

(Translated by Google) the food is delicious and also the service is very good
the hotel is also good

(Original)
makanannya enak enak dan juga servis yang sangat baik
hotelnya juga bagus

(Translated by Google) Honestly, I went to Royal Ambarukmo because of a seminar invitation, and twice (2019 and 2022) in the same place we saw the same problem, namely tableware that was not washed thoroughly and could be said to be still dirty. The last time we visited, we had lunch at a restaurant and when we were about to take drinking water, it turned out that there was dirt and complained to the waitress, even so we appreciate it because they immediately took the glasses we complained about, especially the spoons also had to sort out because many were not clean. Please follow up again.

(Original)
Honestly saya ke Royal Ambarukmo karena undangan seminar, dan sudah dua kali  (2019 dan 2022) di tempat yang sama kami melihat permasalahan yang sama, yaitu peralatan makan yang tidak dicuci secara tuntas dan bisa dikatakan masih kotor. Terakhir berkunjung kami makan siang di restaurant dan ketika hendak mengambil air minum ternyata ada kotorannya dan komplain ke waitress meski begitu kami mengapresiasi karena mereka segera mengambil gelas yang kami komplainkan, terlebih sendok juga harus memilah karena banyak yang belum bersih. Mohon untuk ditindaklanjuti kembali.

(Translated by Google) It's a nice place....unfortunately the food, especially Indonesian food, is a lot sweet

(Translated by Google) I am impressed with the food here.. Setiao breakfast, the food here is simple, there is Indonesian food, bread, dimsum, chicken porridge, etc. The food can be said to be all simple, but all delicious. Nothing failed. It's impressive, because there are many 5-star hotel restaurants that make the food weird but the taste isn't great..

(Original)
I am impressed with the food here.. Setiao breakfast, makanannya semua di sini sederhana, ada makanan Indonesia, roti, dimsum, bubur ayam, dll. Makanannya bisa dibilang semuanya simpel, tapi enak semua. Ga ada yang failed. Impressive sih, karena banyak restoran hotel bintang 5 yang bikin makanannya aneh2 tapi rasanya kurang mantap..

(Translated by Google) Comfortable friendly and delicious

(Original)
Nyaman ramah dan enak

(Translated by Google) Comfortable hotel, love the atmosphere

(Original)
Hotel nyaman, suka dengan suasananya

(Translated by Google) Overall good and satisfying. The rooms are very comfortable, the facilities in the room and hotel are complete. The staff are very friendly, always say hello and take the active initiative to help. I like that the room has an iron and hairdryer available, very helpful.

The swimming pool is big and the water doesn't hurt the eyes. Can be used for adults and children. There is also a garden where you can run, take photos, or relax for a while. There is also a gym for those who like to exercise. There is a kids club house, containing games and PS for children.

The food is quite diverse, there are traditional foods and drinks as well.

It's really worth it to repeat, my advice is not to just stay one day so you can try all the existing facilities.

(Original)
Overall bagus dan memuaskan. Kamar sangat nyaman, fasilitas di kamar maupun hotel lengkap. Staff2 sangat ramah sekali, selalu menyapa dan berinisiatif aktif untuk membantu. Saya suka di kamar sudah tersedia setrika dan hairdryer, sangat membantu sekali.

Kolam renang besar dan air tidak perih di mata. Bisa untuk dewasa dan anak2. Ada taman juga yang bisa dibuat lari2, foto2, maupun bersantai sejenak. Ada gym juga bagi yang suka berolahraga. Ada kids club house, berisi permainan dan ps untuk anak-anak.

Untuk makanan cukup beragam, ada makanan dan minuman tradisional juga.

Sangat worth it untuk diulang kembali, saran saya jangan hanya menginap satu hari agar bisa mencoba semua fasilitas yang ada.

(Translated by Google) The place is clean and comfortable with satisfying service.

(Original)
Tempatnya bersih dan nyaman pelayanan memuaskan.

I checked in early and the receptionist was very kind allowing me to checked in on 12pm. The facility is pretty standard, the room was clean, bathroom is also clean. The only downside is the room was a bit dark with minimal lighting. Also the fridge was a bit smell due to unused for long time I guess. But everything is working fine.

The location is good, since it's beside Galeria mall. You don't need to worry if you need something.

merupakan mall di jogja yang paling sering saya kunjungi. suka saja

(Translated by Google) This place is very comfortable to be an inn in Yogyakarta. Moreover, the strategic location is near a gift shop, Adisucipto Airport, Mangkuraharjo Football Stadium, and the Mall next door. The facilities and security of the place are supportive and the hotel services are very friendly for hotel stays.

(Original)
Tempat ini sangat nyaman untuk jadi penginapan di Yogyakarta. Terlebih lokasi strategis yang dekat toko oleh-oleh, Bandara Adisucipto, Stadion Bola Mangkuraharjo, dan Mall di sebelahnya. Fasilitas dan keamanan tempat mendukung serta pelayanan hotel sangat ramah bagu penginap hotel.

(Translated by Google) The location is very strategic, you just have to walk, you have arrived at Malioboro, want to go to the monument station, just cross the road, the breakfast is also great,,

(Translated by Google) I've never stayed overnight, only seminars are frequent, it can be seen from the service and delicious and classy dishes

(Original)
Kalo menginap sih belum pernah, cuma seringnya acara seminar, terlihat dari pelayanan dan hidangannya yg enak dan berkelas

(Translated by Google) I've been living and earning a living in Jogja for a long time, with all its romance and exoticism..well, I just went inside..enjoying the Japanese war reparations era architecture combined with new contemporary buildings. Entering the back garden feels cool and has a special aura. It's fun.

(Original)
Sudah lama saya tinggal dan mencari nafkah di jogja,dengan segala romantika dan eksotikanya..nah baru sekali masuk ke dalam..menikmati arsitektur era pampasan perang Jepang berpadu dengan bangunan baru yang kontemporer. Masuk ke taman bahgian belakang tambah terasa adem dan aura khasnya. Asyik.

(Translated by Google) Delicious cake and gelato in the lobby cafe.. delicious and really calm.. that's actually what I'm looking for

(Original)
Cake dan gelato nan lezatto di lobby cafe nya..enak dan bener bener calm.. begitulah sebenarnya yang dicari
